General.Name: Orocrypt
General.Description: Indirect precious metals investments can be held in gold, platinum or silver ETF shares. Orocrypt aims to provide an alternative to the above by offering a method of recording precious metals ownership.

ICO.Description:
Indirect precious metals investments can be held in gold, platinum or silver ETF shares. Orocrypt aims to provide an alternative to the above by offering a method of recording precious metals ownership.

Orocrypt  will be holding its ICO on June 14, 2017. There will be a total of 500,000 Class A tokenized shares available for €9 EUR each at the offering. The ICO is expected to end on July 14, 2017.

The ICO did not raise its minimum of 1,199,997 EUR and will be issuing a refund to all those who participated in the crowdsale.
